content: crocheted flat and seamed this luxurious linen stitch cowl uses three beautiful colors of metalico experience level * advanced beginner materials * metalico 50% baby alpaca 50% silk 50g/147yds 2 hanks a 2 hanks b 2 hanks c * size f 3 75mm hook or size needed to obtain gauge finished measurements * circumference 24½ blocked * height 17 blocked color shown * opal no 1610 a * rose quartz no 1634 b * copper no 1637 c
